item.title: About
item.description: Tiny Code Christmas Tiny Code Christmas is an initiative by LoveByte Demoparty to spread our love of sizecoding to the masses! Join the LoveByte Discord and follow LoveByte on Twitter and Mastodon for more info!
item.content:
Tiny Code Christmas

Tiny Code Christmas is an initiative by LoveByte Demoparty to spread our love of sizecoding to the masses!

Join the LoveByte Discord and follow LoveByte on Twitter and Mastodon for more info!
